sentences.en: And it has been a clever innovator with its supply chain.
sentences.cn: 在供应链方面它也是独具匠心.

sentences.en: BGI an innovator in investment management, applying and technology to the investment process.
sentences.cn: BGI在投资管理领域不断创新, 把科技手段运用到投资进程中.

sentences.en: Bosch is renowned as consensus - driven but also as a great innovator.
sentences.cn: 博世因以协商一致为推动力而著称,但同时也是一家伟大的创新型企业.

sentences.en: Cablofil is the worldwide leader and innovator in wire mesh cable tray since 1972.
sentences.cn: 自1972年以来,卡博菲就是在电缆桥架的全球领先者和创新者.

sentences.en: He is an innovator in this field.
sentences.cn: 他是这个领域里的革新者。

sentences.en: He was an innovator in engineers , transmissions and mechanical components.
sentences.cn: 他在发动机, 传动,机械构件方面搞了一些革新.

sentences.en: Since its inception in l 97 l , the NASDAQ Stock Market has been the innovator.
sentences.cn: 自1971年诞生之日起, 纳斯达克股票市场就成了产业的革新者.

sentences.en: Trade secret profit plays as innovator's rationality constraint for whether to accept patent contract.
sentences.cn: 由此,商业机密利润构成了厂商是否接受专利契约的参与约束.

words.tran_cn: 革新的；富有革新精神的

trans.tran_en: someone who introduces changes and new ideas
